column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I used to work around the corner from this Lou Malnati's
column2: and lived around the corner from the one in Lincoln Park.  As for this one
column3: I only ate their lunch specials
column4: and they are absolutely top notch.  A personal pizza or pasta
column7: and a soda for all of like $6.  Absurdly affordable
column8: and incredibly tasty.  Having a LM nearby for lunch made my job somewhat tolerable (for about a year).
